text: Ælce sunnandæg bebeod þe ðære þrynnesse naman, þæt is fæder & sunu & se halga gast.
& singbenedicite&Gloria in excelsis Deo&credo in Deum&pater nosterCriste to lofe, þonne gelimpð þe ealle wucan þe bet.
Mihtest þu gewunian þæt ðu hit sunge ælce dæge, þonne ðu ærest onwoce.

& cweþ ðonne God ælmihtig, for þinre miclan mildheortnesse & for ðissa godes worda mægne, miltsa me, & syle me minra gedonra synna forgyfnesse, & ðara toweardra gescildnessa, & þine bletsunga to eallum þingum & huru minre sawle reste on ðam ecan life & a ðine miltse.
& geþenc ælce frigedæge, þæt ðu strecce þe on eorðan Godes þances, & singDeus misereatur nostri.
& do þis dihlice, þær ðu sylf sy.
& geþenc þæt he ðrowode on þone dæg micel for eall mancyn.

Ne mæg ænig mann on his agen geþeode þa geswinc & þara costnunga nearonessa, þe him onbecumað, Gode swa fulfremedlice areccan, ne his mildheortnesse biddan, swa he mæg mid þillicum sealmum & mid oþrum swilcum.
Gyf þu ælce dæge þine tid sangas wel asingst, ne þearft ðu næfre to helle, & eac on þisse worulde þu hæfst þe gedefe lif.
& gyf ðu on hwilcum earfeðum byst & to Gode clypast, he ðe miltsað & eac tiþað, þonne þu hine bitsð, amen.
